attributes.action: To give tax relief to those in the low band tax rate and who are not eligable for tax credits
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We urge the Prime Minister to allow those that fall under the low band tax rate who are not entitled to receive tax credits (i.e from the age of 18yrs old with a minium wage) to receive tax relief to help them through the difficult times ahead.
